resources.string:
"Having a hard time making a decision?

"
"This app's focus is to help you by applying weights to your decisions, and showing " "you your best possible option. 
" "Fill out this form and continue to the next step."
This is where text will go for the career preset
This is where text will go for the college preset
This is where text will go for the residence preset

"You must now rate, between 1 and 5, how you feel about one" " choice over the other.

"
"Carefully consider how much you prioritize the first option" " over the second option
"
"Now you must give up to 7 different options that you" " are having a hard time choosing from.\n\n"
"Your hard to make choices go here"
